name: Apaizta Lamiak
description:
A small proyect based on classic G&G games in a SNES style, using vasque country folklore.

Hi! Im Hichi, a small indie developer. I uploaded this game as an experiment to learn a bit more about pixel art, programming, game design etc.

There is only a small tutorial to try basic mechanics, but i will be adding more stages, enemies, mechanics... To learn and hopefully meet people willing to give feedback or help me evolve as an indie developer. Nice to meet you!!!

This tutorial has:

- 3 types of basic enemies

- 3 types of attacks

- 1 final boss + 1 secret boss

- Scores based on time, fights, actions etc.
